# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to us at $12,000, reflecting its quality and uniqueness. Given its worth to you is estimated at $10,000, I propose a fair deal that could benefit both of us. I kindly invite you to consider purchasing this product for $11,500. This offer not only provides you with an opportunity to acquire something truly special but also ensures you receive it at a competitive price. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
